result.eng: There are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.
result.ga: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisin
result.orig: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisin
result.html: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollmhargadh ann freisinThere are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.
result.ponchtml: Tá neart siopaí ann agus tá ollṁargaḋ ann freisinThere are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.

result.eng: There's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
result.ga: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é
result.orig: Tá ollmhargadh agus cúpla monarcha in Indreabhán ach ní baile fós é

result.ponchtml: Tá ollṁargaḋ agus cúpla monarċa in Indreaḃán aċ ní baile fós éThere's a supermarket and a couple of factories in Indreabhán, but it isn't [what you would call] a town yet.
